text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.title: Small Totem Config
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.totem: Adjusts the base size of the Totem
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.popSi: Adjusts the pop size of the Totem
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.enabl: A animation of totem growing and shrinking
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.showT: Show the number of Totems in your inventory
Show Own Totem Count under Crosshair
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.showO: Shows a overlay when a totem pops
Show Color Overlay upon Totem Pop
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.disab: Disables all rotations in Totem pop animation
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.stati: Keeps the Totem pop size static during animation
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.xPosi: 0 left edge, 100 right edge of the screen
X Position of the totem from center (Width)
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.yPosi: 0 top edge, 100 bottom edge of the screen
Y Position of the totem from center (Height)
text.autoconfig.totemtweaks.option.enabl: A animation of the totem pop growing and shrinking
